data.content:
noun
plural ~ ratings
[count] :a score or grade that a company or organization gives to a possible borrower and that indicates how likely the borrower is to repay a loan
Credit ratings are based on how much money, property, and debt a borrower has and on how well the borrower has paid past debts.
sự đánh giá độ tin cậy (để phát thẻ tín dụng cho khách hàng)
